flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • Old Xbox 360, Perspex Sheet, Acetate for printing, Double sided foam tape
Tools
  • Dremel tool with cuttigng, grinding, or routing bits, pencil

parts.text: Old Xbox 360, Perspex Sheet, Acetate for printing, Double sided foam tape

guide.summary: Re using a Red ringed or dead Xbox console into a brilliant lamp for any gaming or entertainment room. Simple, easy & fun!
guide.title: Turn an Old XBox 360 into a colourful Lamp - With Bonus Magnets!

tools.text: Dremel tool with cuttigng, grinding, or routing bits, pencil
